title: Island of Regrets
description: Stolen diamonds are missing; a fortune is at stake and evidence concealed for more than a hundred years points to a location on a lonely, mist-shrouded dot of land in the Southern Ocean. Unraveling a puzzle leads four treasure hunters on a search that could become homicidal.History and fiction mix in this enthralling modern-day novel of suspense.
author: Thomas W. Devine
